name: Samurai Jack: The Shadow of Aku
summary: As the fearless and noble warrior, Samurai Jack, you are thrust into the future where the world has been conquered by your arch foe Aku. Master Jack's signature moves to battle your way through 4 enemy-filled realms and 24 interactive levels. Meet your favorite friends and foes like the Scotsman, Mad Jack and more. Discover a portal that connects you with your ancestors who help guide you through burning villages and down hidden pathways. Free prisoners, dodge fireballs and sword strokesâ€”ultimately defeat Aku once and for all!
